Author: i-chain.net
Title: [ANN][ICO] 💠 I-CHAIN 💠 Insurance Platform and Ecosystem 🔥
Body: I-CHAIN.NET is a global online insurance platform based on blockchain technology. Watch the video to get the idea of our project: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=usVx8KNqLdI.  Our project is not like many other blockchain projects. Firstly, I-CHAIN platform is ready. And, there is the first product on the platform – crypto bank. It means if you register at platform – you can organize own crypto bank in 30 minutes. Secondly, the purpose of I-CHAIN is not to earn money, but to give everybody the opportunity to create own business.  But first of all you need our token. Now it is available here: https://i-chain.net, TOKEN. If you have any problems, watch this video: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Mw5QWt0MaFg.  ICHN token gives you the opportunity to create your own business on the platform. For the present there is only one product – mini-bank. You can open your own crypto bank providing secure crypto deposit, real human support, easy process of fiat money to crypto conversion and ability to restore access to funds even if you lost your wallet. In the very near future there will be many more business alternatives. For instance, soon we expect insurance fund for community and 2 products that you have chosen - payment system (p2p) and product/service guarantee. In sum, this year – dozens of products.  The platform attracts initiative people, and these people already run their businesses on the platform and develop it. To run a mini-bank you need half an hour of time and desire.  We are planning a lot of products; there will be a lot of variants of your own business on the platform, too. To get started, you need an Utility token, its price is now floating, it is about 0,45 ETH.  As for utility from the point of view of the end user (common for the platform as a whole and its any products): When you take out insurance in the insurance company and the risk did not happen, the company takes your money. In the case of a platform product, for example, "the community of insurers" - money remains in the community and can be spent on community needs. The policy is cheaper (there is no additional charges, as in a "classic" insurance company). Transparency of decisions made - you vote for the payments yourself. As for utility from the point of view of a merchant: With the help of the platform, you can organize your own business in a few clicks. You just need an Utility token for every 1000 clients, organize advertising, invite clients and get their support.  How it works: in about 30 minutes you can set up your product on the platform, then serve the customers and earn commissions.  You can contact us via e-mail: sales@i-chain.net. Our colleague will answer on your questions and help to start a business on I-CHAIN.NET platform.  Today ICO subject is surrounded by negative stuff. That's why we closed I-CHAIN ICO ahead of time, on the 15th of January, 2019. Now our token is available on secondary market. In any case, we continue to work, regardless of whether the ICO is open or not.  Platform is ready, you can become a partner and start your own business on the Platform if you have I-CHAIN.NET token.  https://marketplace.i-chain.net/, https://docs.i-chain.net/  Together we will improve customer experience in insurance and finance industry.

Author: i-chain.net
Title: [ANN][ICO] 💠 I-CHAIN 💠 Insurance Platform and Ecosystem 🔥
Body: https://b.radikal.ru/b28/1807/c9/303ba3a747c6.jpg  I-CHAIN.NET is a global online insurance platform based on blockchain technology which will radically change the insurance industry.  I-CHAIN major features and services  Insurers (partners) can publish their products on the Platform, customers can buy and use these products. Platform will cover common insurance processes (i.e. sales, claim processing) and channels of communication (website, mobile application). Also it will be possible to design additional products with extended processes and channels and place these products on marketplace for Insurers to acquire and use them for their business expansion. Risk pools will be created to cover insurance risks and there will be possibility to invest into Risk pools.  Main advantages  Affordability Insurance companies, just businesses or individual entrepreneurs will connect to the I-chain to create their products and then sell them to consumers. Also, anyone who want to obtain insurance will have an opportunity to do so directly on the website, using social networks, mobile applications or instant messengers. In addition, partner companies and consumers will use it for free. It is planned to charge a commission of 0.5% transaction fee for each transaction conducted on the platform. The money will help to maintain and develop our online platform.  Transparency The development of the platform is transparent, and the final product does not depend on the founders of the project.  Diversity We have the opportunity to expand the range of insurance products due to lower prices and the absence of bureaucratic superstructure.  I-CHAIN solving problems  The Platform will resolve many issues. First of all, scalability issues will be resolved by the fact that blockchain layer will be used by portion of data when it is only needed, parts of data needed for insurance companies will be located on our platform. Secondly, Platform will shorten time-to-market, insurers will not need to build their solutions from the scratch, platform will provide them framework and will not require deep expertise in blockchain to start sell “ic insurance” products. Moreover, common platform will also help to resolve common regulatory issues, as it will lobby interest of all industry players and their customers. I-CHAIN Platform will make it possible for individual insurers to compete for customers, offering a range of custom products they will set up with products constructor. Platform will also allow the industry as a whole to streamline its processing and offer a better user experience for customers who have to make a claim. In addition, storing claims and customer information on a blockchain would cut down fraudulent activity – it would certainly make it much harder for criminals to mask their identities or attempt to claim more than once.  Technology behind I-CHAIN  I-CHAIN is based on blockchain technology. Thus, all information about customers, insurance contracts and transactions will be stored in blockchain. This will guarantee maximum transparency, significantly reduce costs of preventing fraud activities, which are borne by insurance companies nowadays, and simplify report preparation for regulators. Our platform is so-called "Uber of insurance." It will connect insurance companies, related businesses and consumers and radically change the insurance industry. Blockchain slowly but steadily gets into various spheres of our life. After full version platform launch, we plan to conduct a global marketing campaign and establish partnerships with companies around the world. The market of Blockchain for insurance has no country borders or limits.  ICO  Start date: 2018-05-17 End date: 2019-05-16 Token ticker: ICHN Token type: ERC20 Price: 1 ICHN=0.1 ETH Accept: Ethereum Soft cap: 100 000 ETH Hard cap: 500 000 ETH Total tokens: 14 000 000 Tokens Author: i-chain.net
Title: [ANN][ICO] 💠 I-CHAIN 💠 Insurance Platform and Ecosystem 🔥
Body: Unfortunately Russian government (and almost any government) is very conservative and do not fund blockchain projects :-). So we are funded by private investor, not a secret, see our site. In near future new private investors will join. We built platform which will allow anyone quickly create own insurance product and act as insurance company, platform will cover not only IT/business processes/sales but legal/licensing needs. And most %% of budget is needed for that (legal/licensing). If we analyze budget to setup insurance company, we will see that licensing is 80-90% of it. Based on insurance industry size (4 trnl/yearly), 500K ETH is not huge amount in view of such platform setup. Even if we say that platform will occupy 1% of insurance market - 2 bln/yearly, the budget to setup it will look moderate.

Body: Hello I-chain readers,    Our team just wrote up an ICO review for I-chain, here’s a quick overview: Their Insurance Platform, I-Chain, will enable insurers to publish their products on the Platform, where customers can buy and use those products. A website and mobile application will serve as channels of communication and facilitate common processes such as sales, processing of claims and others.    We’d love your input and comments https://www.globalfromasia.com/investments/i-chain-ico-review/    Thanks!

Author: i-chain.net
Title: [ANN][ICO] 💠 I-CHAIN 💠 Insurance Platform and Ecosystem 🔥
Body: Update  Glass Cube Ltd. company thanks you for participating in the development of I-CHAIN.NET blockchain Platform, which is aimed at creating affordable and fair insurance that will allow people all over the world to receive insurance products at a much more affordable price than today. The main partner and the development team have completed the work on first version of I-CHAIN.NET Platform. Soon everyone will be able to use its services. In most developed and developing countries government regulation, which is associated with the toughening of requirements for the production of tokens, and in some cases a complete ban on the production of tokens, makes it difficult to use the ICO mechanism to distribute tokens. In such circumstances due to increased legal risks Glass Cube Ltd. considers it inappropriate to continue the ICO and notifies of its closure on January 15, 2019. Until January 15, 2019, tokens will be still available through the ICO. After January 15, 2019, tokens will be available on secondary market organized by our company. Check out the latest news on our website. Quite possibly in the secondary market the price of tokens will be higher. All ICHN tokens’ holders will certainly be able to take the privilege granted by these tokens according to the Whitepaper.  Specifically, you get the access to our marketplace: https://marketplace.i-chain.net. You will find our first product “mini-bank” («secure deposit») there. Register at marketplace and start your own business on Platform, organize your own crypto-bank. One token makes it possible to create business for 1000 clients. List of products on the Platform will only grow as your business.  Guarantee your investments into our ICO: https://guarantee.i-chain.net.  Also registration on marketplace provides an opportunity to become developer on Platform, create your own product and earn on your product sales. Documentation for developers: https://docs.i-chain.net/en/latest/.  Platform welcomes entrepreneurs and developers!  #insurance #blockchain #ichainnet #glasscube #insure #platform #buy #ICHN #try #project #product #technology #industry #marketplace #register

Author: i-chain.net
Title: [ANN][ICO] 💠 I-CHAIN 💠 Insurance Platform and Ecosystem 🔥
Body: I-chain.net ICO is closing ahead of time, on the 15th of January 2019. Platform is ready, you can become a partner and start your own business on the Platform if you have our token.  https://marketplace.i-chain.net/  Now the first product is available, you can open your own crypto bank providing secure crypto deposit, real human support and easy process of fiat to crypto conversion and ability to restore access to funds even if you lost your wallet. By the end of the year we expect new products - insurance fund for community and charity fund. In 2019 - many more. Token is now available on our website at nominal value. After January 15 we will sell it at a higher price. Support for current and future partners - sales@i-chain.net and in our community group in Telegram:  https://t.me/joinchat/F462i0nPobK18q8qvJdubA  Together we will improve customer experience in insurance and finance industry.

Author: i-chain.net
Title: [ANN][ICO] 💠 I-CHAIN 💠 Insurance Platform and Ecosystem 🔥
Body: I-CHAIN ICO is not like other usual ICOs. Firstly, there is the first product on the platform - crypto bank. Secondly, the purpose of ICO is not to earn money, but to distribute our token. Till January 15, 2019 you can buy it at the price of 0,1 ETH.  Now ICO subject is surrounded by negative stuff. That's why we are closing I-CHAIN ICO on the 15th of January, 2019, the token price will certainly rise.  In any case, we will continue to work, regardless of whether the ICO is open or not.
